lowcode.label: get app variable
lowcode.documentation: Get value of the global variable

lowcode.label: set app variable
lowcode.documentation: Sets a new value to the global variable

lowcode.label: open or navigate page
lowcode.documentation: Navigate to another page

lowcode.label: evaluate decision table
lowcode.documentation: Evaluates the provided data and returns back the matched output
lowcode.insertText: let decisionOutput = await kf.app.evaluateDecision("${1:flowId}", { inputField1: "value", inputField2: "value" })

lowcode.label: get local variable
lowcode.documentation: Get value of the local variable

lowcode.label: set local variable
lowcode.documentation: Sets specified variable to new value in page scope

lowcode.label: get input parameter
lowcode.documentation: Get specific input parameter of the page

lowcode.label: get all input parameters
lowcode.documentation: Get all input parameters in the page

lowcode.label: open a popup
lowcode.documentation: Opens a popup in the page

lowcode.label: get component in page
lowcode.documentation: Get the specified component instance from the current page

lowcode.label: refresh the component
lowcode.documentation: Refreshes the component

lowcode.label: hide the component
lowcode.documentation: Hides the component from page

lowcode.label: show the component
lowcode.documentation: Shows the hidden component from page

lowcode.label: set active tab
lowcode.documentation: Sets the specified tab index as active - works only for the tab component

lowcode.label: set selected item
lowcode.documentation: Sets the specified instance as selected item - works only for master detail component

lowcode.label: get popup parameter
lowcode.documentation: Get specific parameter in the popup

lowcode.label: get all popup parameters
lowcode.documentation: Get all parameters in the popup as object

lowcode.label: close active popup
lowcode.documentation: Closes the active popup in the page

lowcode.label: get instance id
lowcode.documentation: Get the instance id from event arguments

lowcode.label: get activity instance id
lowcode.documentation: Get the activity instance id from event arguments

nocode.label: get field value
nocode.documentation: Get value of a field in form

nocode.label: set field value
nocode.documentation: Set value of a field in form

nocode.label: set field value - bulk
nocode.documentation: Set value of a field in form

nocode.label: get form json
nocode.documentation: Returns whole data of current form in json format

nocode.label: get table instance
nocode.documentation: Get instance of table, which can be further used to add or delete rows

nocode.label: add a row in table
nocode.documentation: Appends a row entry to table

nocode.label: get table row
nocode.documentation: Returns all columns with values in specified row

nocode.label: get table json
nocode.documentation: Returns all rows & columns data inside table in json format

common.label: api call
common.documentation: Makes an API call to any kissflow rest api end points

common.label: get dataform item
common.documentation: API call to get dataform item

common.label: update dataform item
common.documentation: API call to update dataform item

common.label: delete dataform item
common.documentation: API call to delete dataform item

common.label: create new dataform item
common.documentation: API call to create new dataform item

common.label: create new case item
common.documentation: API call to create new case item

common.label: create new process item
common.documentation: API call to create new process item
